name: Project Vitalis
description:
Project Vitalis is an online multiplayer game where 2 teams fight each other, but the teams have main, connected health. Every character has a different power, and weapon.

When one team's health goes to 0 the other team wins.

Be aware that the game hasn't been tested on mac or Linux, so if you have a problem than say it in the comments

The game includes:

1v1

2v2

3v3

4v4

5v5
